seniority_level.evidence: Posting states 5-7 years of BPM experience and 2+ years with Appian, indicating 5-7 years overall.

job_family.evidence: Title and description explicitly refer to the role as a Data Engineer.

sub_specialty.evidence: Description mentions batch processing alongside real‑time, with focus on data gathering, storage and ETL style workflows.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people‑management responsibilities or direct reports; role is purely technical.

primary_cloud.evidence: Job posting and extraction contain no references to AWS, Azure, GCP or any cloud provider.

secondary_clouds.evidence: No additional cloud platforms are referenced.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Text explicitly states work on both batch and real‑time processing.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools (Airflow, Luigi, etc.) are listed.

storage_layer.evidence: No storage technologies (warehouse, lake, lakehouse) are mentioned.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is specified as Pune, Maharashtra, India with no remote‑work language.

timezone_focus.evidence: Job is based in India, indicating an APAC timezone focus.

relocation_required.evidence: Posting does not state any relocation requirement.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is not mentioned in the posting or extraction.

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work‑authorization restrictions are described.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type (W2, C2C, 1099) is not specified.

benefits_level.evidence: Benefits such as health, PTO, equity, etc., are not listed.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: The posting contains no language about career growth or advancement paths.

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship or coaching programs are referenced.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion or career ladder.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No reference to internal transfers or mobility.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career track (IC, management, specialist, architect) is described.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Multiple must‑have hard skills are listed with no nice‑to‑have alternatives.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description focuses specifically on BPM‑related data engineering responsibilities.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Required experience (5‑7 years) aligns with the listed technical skills.
